entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Fort Nelson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:11 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -19.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Nelson Airport 02:09 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -19.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -22.2°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
